pages.text: Pool crafting is the method by which one can infuse ingredients with the essence of catalyst flowers and combine ingredients into more magical products.

The basic construction used for pool crafting is a rectangle of water sources surrounded on all sides by flowers. A pool can be as small as 1x1 and as large as 7x7. Pool crafting recipes require a number of things to work. Firstly, every recipe requires certain flowers be present in the construction. Secondly, recipes will require a number of unique flowers to be present. Finally, recipes also require their ingredients be placed into the water of the pool.

To activate pool crafting, an amethyst starter must be used, either manually or in a dispenser, into the water of the pool. The pool will consume its ingredients and, after a breif flourish, the pool will spit out its product into the air.
